text: Simeon Raleigh (24 March 1909 – 1 December 1934) was an English professional footballer. Raleigh's clubs included Huddersfield Town, Hull City and Gillingham. While playing for Gillingham in a match against Brighton & Hove Albion on 1 December 1934, he suffered a haemorrhage following a blow to the head and died in hospital later the same day. The club raised over £250 for his widow and child. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1934 deaths Category:Footballers from Rotherham Category:English footballers Category:English Football League players Category:Association football forwards Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Gillingham F.C. players Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Association football players who died while playing
title: Sim Raleigh
